parity_gates.name: Unit tests
parity_gates.evidence: 49 unit tests in fj-ffi covering buffer, registry, call dispatch, callback, marshal, integration, adversarial, property tests

parity_gates.name: Oracle/differential conformance
parity_gates.evidence: 5 oracle tests: FFI double, sum3, negate_vec match Rust computation; Value roundtrip preserves data; error propagation is structured

parity_gates.name: Adversarial validation
parity_gates.evidence: 6 adversarial tests: unregistered target, duplicate reg, buffer mismatch, concurrent FFI (8 threads), callback error, callback arity

parity_gates.name: Metamorphic properties
parity_gates.evidence: 4 metamorphic tests: marshal identity, error-no-corrupt, empty noop, double composition

parity_gates.name: Performance targets
parity_gates.evidence: All 8 benchmarks under target. Scalar roundtrip=92ns (<500ns), 1K tensor=880ns (<2µs), registry=37ns (<100ns)

parity_gates.name: E2E scenarios
parity_gates.evidence: 6 E2E scenarios: basic call, buffer lifecycle, error propagation, custom op dispatch, adversarial clean errors, callback pipeline

parity_gates.name: Property tests
parity_gates.evidence: prop_f64_scalar_roundtrip, prop_i64_scalar_roundtrip, prop_buffer_size_matches_checked, prop_zeroed_buffer_is_zero (256+ cases each)

parity_gates.name: Risk analysis
parity_gates.evidence: 8-threat risk note with mitigation evidence. 10 invariants verified. Unsafe audit: 1 block in call.rs with SAFETY comment.

known_issues: No dynamic library loading (V1 static linking only)
No vmap/grad support for FFI calls (V1 raises TransformExecutionError)
Complex types (complex64/128) not supported at FFI boundary
Segfault in external code is unrecoverable (process abort)
V1 supports only F64, I64, Bool at the marshal boundary (F32/I32 marshal returns UnsupportedDtype)
